verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> In my <S%H6869>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and from a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to you? or <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be <S%H3254>done<s%> to you, you <S%H7423>false<s%> <S%H3956>tongue?<s%>
<S%H190>Woe<s%> is me, that I <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H4902>Mesech,<s%> that I <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar!<s%>
I am for <S%H7965>peace:<s%> but <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> they are for <S%H4421>war.<s%>
